content:
Our meetings are maturing to be regular reviews of what’s happening on each of our three projects. Do any of you leaders need/want a slot this Thursday?

I’ll want a few minutes to draw attention to the OpenNotes info I posted earlier. You?

@Jan Oldenburg @Maria D Moen @Dave Hill @Abigail Watson @Virginia Lorenzi @Debi Willis
Sure, I'll take a few minutes to update the group on where we are with the PP and PSS.
